description: Number of 'Reverse and Add' steps needed to reach a palindrome starting at n, or -1 if n never reaches a palindrome.
comments: Palindromes themselves are not 'Reverse and Add!'ed, so they yield a zero!
references: D. Wells, The Penguin Dictionary of Curious and Interesting Numbers, pp. 142-3 Penguin Books 1987.
